thread.title: Watch: CJ McCollum 'brings something a little different' to Trail Blazers' PG rotation
thread.title_full: Watch: CJ McCollum 'brings something a little different' to Trail Blazers' PG rotation | OregonLive.com

author: Sean Meagher | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: CJ McCollum 'brings something a little different' to Trail Blazers' PG rotation
text:
CJ McCollum is easing into his role as part-time point guard for the Portland Trail Blazers . With Damian Lillard taking Portland's last two preseason games off for rest, McCollum has been the fill-in at point for the Blazers' two-time All-Star.
"CJ is just showing everybody else what we already knew," said Lillard. "I knew that he had the ability (to play point guard). With him being out there and having to basically be in my shoes, have to score and make plays and run the team, it was good for him to be out there like that. Now, we get out there together, he'll be more confident taking that pressure off me and vice-versa."
In the video above, Meyers Leonard, Moe Harkless, Lillard and McCollum talk about McCollum's strengths at point guard.
